title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL Draft 1st Round takeaways; Loving draft phone calls; Late Round picks overvalued; Tyreek Hill's future
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – NFL Draft 1st Round takeaways; Loving draft phone calls; Late Round picks overvalued; Tyreek Hill's future
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff runs down the biggest storylines from the 1st round of the NFL Draft, why watching draft calls is so pure, why late round draft picks are overvalued, whether Tyreek Hill is done for good in the NFL, and answers listener questions in an NFL Draft heavy Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
